metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6813 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
When protecting CSS blocks with the nonce feature of Content Security Policy, the @import statement in the CSS block could allow an attacker to inject arbitrary styles, bypassing the intent of the Content Security Policy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 74.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
